entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
